short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome browser extension for the McGill Rocket Team's SMD components library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brief User Guide
* Access is restricted to users who hold a valid student McGill email address (i.e. *@mail.mcgill.ca)

* You will have to login each time you want to add a component to the database or if you exit the extension. I haven't figured out a way to fix this yet :/

* Navigate to any product page that has the following as a prefix `https://www.digikey.ca/product-detail/en/`

* Click the `MRTlib` extension icon to start the extension

* Sign-in with a valid McGill student email address

* Accept the verification email that will be sent to you

* You can now use the extension
